title: pAmbaNi pittanai
sahitya:
pAmbaNi pittanaip-paNindiDum punitargaL piravAr iravArE


anupallavi

  tImpunal gangaiyum tenkadirp-piraikkITrum shambar shuDarum mEni tanil pulit-tOlum magizh


caraNam    panivarait-tava yOgi pAravtI bhAgam koNDOn tanimudal paramjyOti tarpparan marai tandOn 
amudinai uNDOr sHva hAlattai uNDu vAzhndOn tamaniya arangil ninru tANDavam puriyum tOnral
